signInRequired: Please sign in to access your tracks
signInDescription: Sign in with your Google account to save and sync your tracks across devices.

trackAccess.title: Sign in Required
trackAccess.description: You need to sign in to access this track. Your tracks are stored securely in the cloud.
trackAccess.redirectMessage: After signing in, you'll be redirected back to your track.

login.title: Strudel
login.welcomeSubtitle: Live coding environment for musical patterns
login.trackAccessDescription: Sign in to access this shared track and sync your music across devices.
login.signInDescription: Sign in to sync your tracks across devices and access cloud features.
login.signInFooter: Sign in to access all features and sync your tracks to the cloud.

migration.title: Migrate Your Tracks
migration.subtitle: Move your local tracks to the cloud
migration.hasLocalData: We found tracks saved locally on this device.
migration.noLocalData: No local tracks found to migrate.
migration.migrationDescription: We can migrate your existing tracks to your cloud account so you can access them from any device.

errors.signOutFailed: Sign out failed. Please try again.

errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
